trans-unit.source: Enables Windows Forms controls to be bound to ADO recordsets.
trans-unit.target: 可使 Windows 窗体控件绑定到 ADO 记录集。

trans-unit.source: This type is a managed equivalent of the Visual Basic 6.0 msbind library.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是 Visual Basic 6.0 msbind 库的托管等效项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data field.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数据字段。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含数据的 <see langword="String" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data format for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据字段的数据格式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp" /> 接口。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> and, optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 使用的非托管资源，也可以释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 使用的非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> and, optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding" /> 使用的非托管资源，也可以释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`参数设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由该控件引用任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key value for a data field.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据字段的键值。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the key value.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含键值的 <see langword="String" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数据对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含数据的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a property from a data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据对象中属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> that contains the property name.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含属性名称的 <see langword="String" />。
